title: Rotational kinematics - angular speed of rod

content.question: A thin rod that is free to rotate about its top end is initially held in place at an angular position of <math alttext="negative theta sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, as shown.
